Name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
desc: Classic Mario Kart action, anywhere, anytime! With Nintendo Switch, fans can enjoy the definitive version of Mario Kart 8 anywhere, anytime, even with up to 8 friends in local wireless multiplayer.
desc2: Bursting with your favourite characters and tracks! Includes all 16 DLC tracks and all 36 characters from the Wii U version with new characters joining the roster, too: Inkling Boy and Inkling Girl from Splatoon, King Boo, Dry Bones, and Bowser Jr.!
